Stem: Robust and covered in soft white hairs.
Leaves: Broad, strap like and long, with white midrib.
Flowers: V-shaped fluffy head above the leaves on thick stems.
FruitSeeds: Seeds 7-9 mm long, hairy, with bent and twisted awns.
Habitat: Rangelands, roadsides and bushland on urban fringes.
DistinguishingFeatures: Height and hairy stems, harder to distinguish when younger.
Impacts: Alters vegetation structure and dramatically increases fire risk.
